column3: I'd like to bring the intended functionality back too but it requires reworking out the outbound semaphores work and I wanted to get a fix up the user reporting 4034 could test. Since it never worked at all, I didn't think adding the functionality was a top priority.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/0bd05b53b155bc28b6e5dfd967cafaafb44a439f for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
